Verses: 1 karththar En Saththaththaiyum En Vinnappaththaiyum Kettadhinaal, Avaril Anbukoorugiren.
2 avar Thamadhu Seviyai Enakku Saaiththapadiyaal, Naan Uyirodirukkumalavum Avarai Thozhudhukolluven.
3 maranakkattugal Ennai Sutrikkondadhu, Paadhaala Idukkangal Ennai Pidiththadhu; Ikkattaiyum Sanjalaththaiyum Adaindhen.
4 appozhudhu Naan Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Thozhudhukondu: Karththaave, En Aaththumaavai Viduviyum Endru Kenjinen.
5 karththar Kirubaiyum Needhiyumullavar, Nammudaiya Dhevan Manaurukkamaanavar.
6 karththar Kabadatravargalai Kaakkiraar; Naan Melindhuponen, Avar Ennai Ratchiththaar.
7 en Aaththumaave, Karththar Unakku Nanmai Seydhapadiyaal, Nee Un Ilaippaarudhalukku Thirumbu.
8 en Aaththumaavai Maranaththukkum, En Kannai Kanneerukkum, En Kaalai Idarudhalukkum Thappuviththeer.
9 naan Karththarukku Munbaaga Jeevanullor Dhesaththile Nadappen.
10 visuvaasiththen, Aagaiyaal Pesugiren; Naan Migudhiyum Varuththappatten.
11 endha Manushanum Poiyan Endru En Manakkalakkaththile Sonnen.
12 karththar Enakku Seydha Ellaa Ubagaarangalukkaagavum, Avarukku Ennaththai Seluththuven.
13 ratchippin Paaththiraththai Eduththukkondu, Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Thozhudhukolluven.
14 naan Karththarukku Seydha Poruththanaigalai Avarudaiya Janangalellaarukku Munbaagavum Seluththuven
15 karththarudaiya Parisuththavaangalin Maranam Avar Paarvaikku Arumaiyaanadhu.
16  Karththaave, Naan Umadhu Adiyen; Naan Umadhu Adiyaalin Puththiranum, Umadhu Oozhiyakkaaranumaayirukkiren; En Kattugalai Avizhththuvitteer.
17 naan Umakku Sthoththirabaliyai Seluththi, Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Thozhudhukolluven.
18 naan Karththarukku Seydha Poruththanaigalai Avarudaiya Janangalellaarukku Munbaagavum,
19 karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Piraagaarangalilum, Erusaleme Un Naduvilum Niraivetruven. Allelooyaa.
